entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
